title: "The Righteous, like Sandalwood, Perfume the Axe That Falls on Them" («Le Juste comme le bois de santal parfume la hache qui le frappe»), plate XLVI from Miserere
medium: Aquatint and drypoint with roulette over photogravure from an illustrated book with 22 aquatints over photogravure (19 with drypoint, 18 with roulette, five with etching)
